meanings.definition: A man who is exceptionally skilled or successful in attracting and seducing women.
meanings.sent1: The superstud at the party effortlessly charmed everyone with his smooth talk.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't resist the charm of the superstud who always knew the right thing to say.
meanings.sent3: The superstud's ability to make everyone laugh made him the life of the party.
meanings.sent4: He was like a superstud magician, weaving words that cast a spell on those around him.
meanings.sent5: The image of the superstud in his sharp suit was etched in her mind.

meanings.definition: A person who is considered to be exceptionally virile or sexually potent.
meanings.sent1: The wrestler was known as the superstud of the ring, overpowering his opponents with ease.
meanings.sent2: In the eyes of many, he was the ultimate superstud, exuding confidence and strength.
meanings.sent3: The superstud's secret weapon was his contagious energy that lit up the room.
meanings.sent4: His presence was like that of a superstud lion, commanding respect and admiration.
meanings.sent5: The legend of the superstud's prowess spread far and wide.
